page.title: 05 FAMILY LIFE
page.content: When I wake up I'm usually first so I get up get dressed then go down stairs to make some tea for my mum and sister Karen. My dad has already gone to work. My dad works at the pit .After I've made the tea I call up and tell my Mum it's ready. Then I have some Coco Pops , have a wash and brush my teeth.I get my bag ready, then I do a job for mum like washing up the pots or tidying up. At 8.00 clock we all get our shoes and coat on and go to Joan Strutts house,at Joan's my brother Nathan and Philip play Army.At 8.30 we get our shoes and coats on again and start for school.We run so that we leave Natalie behind.When we get to school we drop our bags and go round to the marble pots because everybody seems to be there .
